thread.title: After devastating wildfires, Californians now brace for mudslides

title: After devastating wildfires, Californians now brace for mudslides
text:
After devastating wildfires, Californians now brace for mudslides 8:30pm GMT - 01:30 
As they continue to recover from December's devastating wildfires, Southern Californians are being told again that they should prepare to evacuate their homes, this time ahead of forecast rain storms. Colette Luke has more.
